title: Christmas wish for my shop.
body: I think Riot should implement a special Christmas/Holiday my shop where each person is given one Christmas wish of a skin that is guaranteed to be in the persons  my shop. Would be a nice treat and it seems money for RP is more available during the holidays. What do you guys think?

replies.body: If I got SKT T1 ~~Nami~~ Sushi for more than 50 % off, I would definitely buy it, yeah.
Would make sense, even if it wouldn't benefit me alot since I don't really like the christmas skins.
Not limiting it to just the Christmas skins. Any skin with maybe a reduced discount since it is guaranteed to be in the persons my shop.
Ooooooh, that would be awesome if I could wish any skin I want. (As long as it isn't legendary or ultimate tier, of course. Riot has to make a living, so they shouldn't put these in the store.)

How can you not like things like Santa "Daddy" Braum, handling his enormous...wishlist!?

http://www.lol-wallpapers.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/Santa-Braum-Splash-Art-League-of-Legends-Artwork-Wallpaper-lol.jpg

And have you seen his ultimate VFX?? He's erecting (...) Christmas trees!

Dunno, I don't like it and most champs with christmas skins have better alternatives in my opinion.
Like Braum, Mafia Braum definitely is the best skin he has. :P
He has a god damn vault! A vault!

The only christmas skin i possess is Ambigious Elf Jinx, but just because I got a skin shard and had the weird desire to own all Jinx skins. :X

Well, I cannot object to personal taste. :)

Personally, I love the Christmas skins - they all appear to be so _cheerful_, for lack of a better word.
For example, that Snow Day Graves recall gave me a right good chuckle when I first saw it.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kFS2-bHHyb4

Not at all pleased about Winter Wonder Lulu though (even as a Lulu main), as Pix looks like a damn zombie in it. Whereas Dragon Trainer Lulu - one the first ever 1350 RP skins, and doesn't even have a recall animation - gives him even his own SFX, and unique animations.
I totally would, since a lot of skins I want (I want one for each champ, but nothing too flashy since they're not my mains) are Legacy now, so getting them is astronomically rare.
Its only one small wish :)

In before "Waat?? No Victorious Elise or Black Alistar!? :O".

^^
Would be cool, but probably exclude skins higher than 1350 since they cant be available in the normal your shop aswell.
Sure why not.
What skin would you choose?
I would choose Riot Graves :) I like that 70s cop mustache.

I bought a 30 Worlds Orb bundle, and I got Snow Day Graves, Rito Graves and Mafia Graves - and I don't play ADCs, junglers...or Graves. :/

12/10 would trade for SKT T1 Sushi or Cosmic Enchantress Lulu.
Ouch! Well hopefully Riot hears our pleas for a good holiday my shop wish!
Love that idea, I'd love to have Tempest Janna and just for fun I would wish for Victorious Janna :3
"I want a skin sale" is not an appropriate topic for Concepts & Creations.

Oh please, I want winter wonder lulu (even though she's garbo rn, one of my fave lulu skins ;_; )
Or maybe bewitching janna since money's tight for me atm.. hmm~
I've bought every skin in my shop every time even if it's all garbage. It's a sickness I think.

Oh man, I really would like to have Frozen Shen in my shop. I had him once there and didn't buy him and now it's the only Skin for him that I dont have.
But the wish should still be limited to skins that are 1350 or cheaper.

Would've liked a third "Of course, depending on the game state" option.

Meddler and the team seem to be doing an amazing job when it comes to S9, but if it turns out like the S8 changes (fantastic on paper, polarizing in practice) probably won't be purchasing any RP.
Sorry it was my first time posting on the forums. Just thought it was a cool idea.
Give me a Riot red post to tell me my idea isnt reasonable! HAHAHAHAHA!{{champion:32}}
